attributes.action: Allow English Passports to say We are English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Am English! Not Welsh Not scotish, and not from Northern Ireland. I will not Stand under the union flag. We should as English People Should be allowed to Say were English And fly our flag with out being hounded by the autorities for being racist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
